page.title: 14A Day in my Life (1)
page.content: I got up at 7o'clock and had a bath and got ready for school.Mum goes to work early so I went to Cheryl's house and helped her to put the rubbish out for the dustmen.When I got to school I had a little play before the whistle went.Then we lined up and went in and had the register.In assembly we had a story about some men in a boat in a storm.They were saved by a lifeboat. The whole school had quiet reading after assembly and then my class had a spelling test and maths until playtime at half past ten. After play we had a singing lesson and then did some more maths.
